abstract: Amazon will sell its newest Kindle for $114, but it will have ads as screen savers and at the bottom of the home screen.
snippet: Amazon will sell its newest Kindle for $114, but it will have ads as screen savers and at the bottom of the home screen.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Amazon is shaving another $25 off the price of its Kindle e-reader, this time with the help of advertisers.

headline.main: Amazon to Sell the Kindle Reader at a Lower Price, but With Advertising Added
headline.print_headline: Amazon to Sell the Kindle Reader at a Lower Price, but With Advertising Added
